campaign.story:
This Kickstarter campaign was created to fund the creation of Jeff Miracola's Fantasy Art Workshop Oil Painting Techniques Video to be released both as a region-free DVD and as a Digital Download.

IMPORTANT!
If you missed out on backing this Kickstarter, don’t worry. Head over to FantasyArtWorkshop.com and sign up for Jeff Miracola's email newsletter so you will be informed when the Oil Painting Techniques video becomes available for pre-order.
If you want to purchase Jeff Miracola's Acrylic Painting Techniques DVD or Digital Download, you can buy that now at Three Points Publishing.
UPDATES!
Bonus Video Stretch Goal UNLOCKED! (See Stretch Goals section below)
FREE "Faun" art print for physical reward backers!
We have removed the "Faun" 5"x7" art print as a stretch goal and have instead decided to give this exclusive art print to every backer of a physical reward for FREE as a way of saying thanks for backing our project. This means you will have an art print that no one else will be able to get :-)
 A Little Background Info
Jeff Miracola has been working in the fantasy art industry for more than 23 years, most notably on Dungeons & Dragons and Magic: the Gathering. A few years ago, he and his videographer wife created a YouTube channel to share videos of his drawing and painting techniques. The channel has since grown to nearly 30,000 subscribers and more than 1.3 million views.  The short videos on his channel have proven popular, but Jeff and Silvia sensed a growing thirst for more in-depth instruction. So, in 2015, they created a Kickstarter for the creation of Jeff Miracola's Fantasy Art Workshop Acrylic Painting Techniques Video. Our wonderful backers turned out and made it a great success.
And now it's time to do it again - this time for the creation of an Oil Painting DVD/Digital Download.
Jeff's first set of serious paints were oil paints, which he purchased as a high school sophomore. He's since been painting in oils: decades of experimenting, making mistakes (and learning from them), and perfecting his oil painting techniques. With this new Oil Painting DVD, he will finally be able to share all of his knowledge with you.
We hope you will consider backing this project. Thank you!
Just a few of the many videos found on Jeff's YouTube channel:
   VERY IMPORTANT: Jeff has not yet created the artwork that will be featured in this oil painting techniques video. The oil painting you see on the DVD mockup above (Tiger warrior) is only used to show you an example of what the packaging will look like. This is not the final image. 
Our planned delivery date for this Oil Painting DVD and all other rewards is April 2017.
The content of this video will benefit beginners to professionals at any stage of their careers. Our goal is to not only give you the most detailed look at Jeff's oil painting process but also to answer your many questions about creating an oil painting from start to finish. Jeff will focus heavily on creating a professional fantasy painting for a paying client. This video won't just cover the "how;" it will also cover the "why."
Here are some of the topics and techniques that will be demonstrated in this video:
Brainstorming/Conceptualization 
Anatomy (Creature and Human) 
Using and Creating Reference Photos
Drawing from the Imagination
Tools for Sketching (Types and Use)
Thumbnail Sketching
Composition
Final Sketch
Color Roughs
Color Theory
Painting Surfaces (Preparation, Materials, and Tools)
Transferring the Final Drawing to its Painting Surface
Planning the Stages of Painting
Work Area
Lighting
Palettes (Types and Use)
Paints (Types and Use)
Brushes (Types and Use)
Knives (Types and Use)
Easels (types and Use)
Solvents (Types and Use)
Oils (Types and Use)
Mediums (Types and Use)
Creating a Colored Ground
Underpainting (Process and Purpose)
Glazing and Scumbling
Wet-on-Wet or Alla Prima
Dry Brushing
Impasto
Controlling Edges
Understanding the Fat over Lean Rule
Working with a Limited Color Palette
Mixing and Blending Colors
Painting Problematic Subjects (Glass, Metal, Skin Tones)
Painting Effects (Splatters, Textures, etc.)
Cleaning Brushes and Other Tools
Varnish (Types and Use)
Varnishing The Final Painting
General Safety (Tools and Materials)
This Oil Painting video will be packed with a lot of information. It will follow the same format as the Acrylic Painting video we created last year, i.e., a 4-disc DVD set. The Main Feature will be split between the first two DVDs. The other two DVDs will contain Extras featuring more detailed information and demonstrations of any techniques not demonstrated in the Main Feature.
Technical Specs for the Oil Painting DVDs:
Number of Discs: 4
Format: NTSC
Language: English
Regions: All Regions
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Age Range: 14 and up
Closed Captioning: Yes
Technical Specs for the Oil Painting Digital Downloads:
Resolution: 1920x1080
Format: MP4
Language: English
  Let's be clear, this current Kickstarter campaign is not to raise money for an Acrylic Painting DVD. We already ran a successful Kickstarter campaign for the Acrylic Painting DVD last year. But for those of you who are just learning about our Fantasy Art Workshop series, here's your chance to get the Acrylic Painting Techniques DVD or Digital Download at lower than retail prices while also supporting and receiving the upcoming Oil Painting DVD.
This four-disc DVD set, with over 6.5 hours of content, gives you the most detailed look at Jeff Miracola’s acrylic painting process and will answer your many questions about creating a fantasy art acrylic painting from start to finish. The focus of the video is on creating a professional fantasy painting.
Discs 1 and 2 contain the Main Feature (3hrs, 19mins), where Jeff takes you along as he creates a forest angel painting from the thumbnail sketch stage to the final painting.
Discs 3 and 4 (3hrs, 17mins) contain this Extras content:
20 Questions with Jeff (Jeff answers many common and not-so common questions about acrylic painting techniques and more.)
Additional Acrylic Painting Techniques (Jeff shows various techniques that are not featured on disc one content.)
Studio Walkthrough (Jeff gives you a tour of his painting studio.)
Building an Art Portfolio (Jeff gives you advice on how to build your art portfolio.)
Painting a Dragon Demo Video (Never before seen video of Jeff painting a dragon)
Color Mixing Exercise
Outtakes and Bloopers (You all know Jeff can never say his lines correctly the first time, but it’s always fun seeing him try.)
You can view more information about the Acrylic Painting Techniques video, including a full chapter list, here.
  Something Wicked Volume 2 will be a collection of six signed 5"x7" monstrously illustrated, full-color art prints in a folded portfolio by Jeff Miracola.
Right now, Jeff has sketches completed for all six prints. The final art will be fully painted in oils. The original oil paintings are also available as rewards for you to own (See THE REWARDS section below).
Every backer of a physical reward will receive this portfolio for FREE. "Digital Download Only" backers will not receive the Something Wicked Volume 2 Portfolio.
Here's a short one minute snippet of me working on one of the Something Wicked - Volume 2 oil paintings:
PLAY

The Something Wicked Volume 1 portfolio is available as an Add-On in this campaign (See ADD-ONS section below).
  Once our Kickstarter campaign reaches the following stretch goals, backers will be rewarded with FREE STUFF!
The Kickstarter campaign has reached it's stretch goal. That means that every backer will now receive a bonus video with additional oil painting demos or other videos I decide to create. It will be filled with all new content never before seen :-)
Physical reward backers will receive the bonus video content in the form of a DVD, as well as a hi-definition digital download.
Digital Download Only backers will receive the bonus video in the form of a hi-definition digital download.
In addition to the Rewards, you can also increase your Pledge to purchase the following Add-ons.
To include Add-ons in your Pledge, simply select the Reward Level that you desire and then manually increase your Pledge by the cost of your selected Add-ons. You will be able to select your Add-ons after the project ends when we send out the Backer Surveys via Backerkit.
  Read some of the praise for Fantasy Art Workshop's Acrylic Painting Techniques. As of the launch of this Kickstarter, the DVD has 37 FIVE-STAR REVIEWS on Amazon:
ImagineFX Magazine gives our Acrylic Painting Techniques DVD their highest honor: a five star rating and artist's choice award!
“Jeff Miracola’s epic-length video provides as comprehensive an overview of acrylics as you could wish for. It’s ideal if you fancy dabbling with physical artwork after working digitally for a while, or are new to making art.” - ImagineFX Magazine
"Serving up a comprehensive master class taught by an inspiring and knowledgeable teacher, this is highly recommended.” - Video Librarian
“Jeff Miracola’s Fantasy Art Workshop: Acrylic Painting Techniques is an absolute must-have for both hobbyist and aspiring professional acrylic painters! Highly recommended.” - Midwest Book Review
"You explained everything in such great detail, it's like you anticipated every question I might have had about every aspect of your painting process. I mean your tutorials on YouTube are really good, but this is absolutely phenomenal. Great production, loved the quick tips and the inspirational quotes. This dvd set would be a bargain at triple the price. Thanks so much for letting us share your insights and talent." - Darren H. (Artist)
“This goes above and beyond his YouTube channel and completely changes how I’ve thought about painting.” - Cory DeVore (Artist)
"The DVD is well produced; this has great information for a beginner and experienced illustrator as well. Interesting to see Jeff's Technique. I really enjoyed the DVD and would definitely recommend to my art friends." - angelcomic (Amazon Review)
"This is a video I will go back and watch again and again, and recommend to anyone interested in acrylic painting." - Mike Hoekstra (Artist)
"Astoundingly good instruction. Thorough, high quality, and entertaining, this is an amazing resource for anyone wanting to get into painting. Worth every penny and more." - Ryan (Amazon Review)
CLICK HERE to read more reviews for Fantasy Art Workshop's Acrylic Painting Techniques DVD on Amazon. 
  Jeff and Silvia are a husband-and-wife team who joined forces to create Jeff Miracola's Fantasy Art Workshop art techniques DVDs. The first DVD in the series, Acrylic Painting Techniques, was created through a successful Kickstarter campaign in 2015. Thank you, awesome backers! You know who you are.
 Jeff Miracola has been creating fantasy art professionally for more than 23 years. He's illustrated for properties such as Dungeons & Dragons, World of Warcraft, Mars Attacks, Star Wars, Planescape, Earthdawn, Shadowrun, and Magic: the Gathering, for which he created more than 110 paintings.
He's also done conceptual toy and video game design, editorial illustrations, and picture books, as well as various activity books for Klutz/Scholastic.
For a few years now, Jeff has been sharing his oil painting, acrylic painting, inking, and drawing techniques through his YouTube channel, which has grown to nearly 30,000 subscribers and over 1.3 million views.
Visit Jeff's website at www.jeffmiracola.com
Silvia Acevedo is an author, media personality, and former journalist. Her 20 years in TV news taught her how to tell a story through great video, which she does as videographer of the Fantasy Art Workshop DVDs and Jeff’s YouTube channel.
When she’s not shooting close ups of Jeff’s art or posing for him or asking him snarky questions in the background, Silvia’s working on her own writing, including her God Awful Series of books for teens and adults.
Find out more about her at silviaacevedo.com
The email you have listed on Kickstarter MUST be a valid email that you check frequently. We will send occasional updates and a final backer survey to the email address you've listed.
Please be prompt in answering your backer survey. The longer it takes you to respond to your survey at campaign's end, the longer it takes for you to receive your reward. 
The physical address that you provide for delivery must be valid and accurate. We will copy and paste this address exactly as written in your backer survey, so your address must be correctly spelled and laid out. If your rewards are returned to us due to a bad address, we will contact you and you must pay again for shipping if you wish to receive your rewards. If your address changes after you have completed your backer survey but before your rewards have shipped, please update your address in your backer survey and send us a message!
Please make sure that your credit card information is correct. If it is not, your pledge will be declined once the campaign has ended and you will be dropped as a backer. (Though if this happens accidentally, you can contact us and we can provide alternate payment options.)
Please be sure to read and understand all of the information on our Kickstarter campaign page before pledging. We want you to be a happy backer :-)
To a U.S. address: from $5 to $15 depending on reward level.
To a Canadian address: from $20 to $30 depending on reward level.
To an address everywhere else: from $25 to $50 depending on reward level.
The success of any crowdfunding campaign relies on people sharing it with others. Please help spread the word by sharing our Kickstarter campaign on your social media sites. Thank you.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've already successfully delivered two Kickstarter projects, one of which was the Acrylic Painting Techniques DVD project. Because we've gone through this before, we know what to expect. Producing this oil painting DVD should be easier. We are using the same manufacturers that made the Acrylic Painting DVD and rewards, so, if you backed our Acrylic DVD project, you're aware of the quality that you can expect for the Oil Painting DVD and its rewards. Read what others had to say in the Reviews section above. 

That being said, any project can experience production delays. However, our suppliers and manufacturers of the DVDs and other rewards are based here in the United States. We expect no delivery delays. Filming and editing of content is nothing new to us. We've done it many, many times. In fact, we've already started filming :-)

Our goal is to deliver all rewards, including digital downloads, in April 2017. 

We will keep you updated at every step of the process. If anything changes, such as our preferred timeline or production schedule, you will be the first to know.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Final Reminder: Ink Drawing Techniques Kickstarter Ending Soon
One Week Left to get my Ink Drawing Techniques Video and Art Book
Ink Drawing Techniques DVD & Art Book Kickstarter is NOW LIVE!
Preview of Inking Techniques Video and Art Book Kickstarter Campaign
Come meet Magic: the Gathering Art Director Dawn Murin at Illustration Intensive
Fantasy Art Workshop's Illustration Intensive
updates.update_content:
Hi, Everyone.
My wife and I have created a new, in-person workshop called Fantasy Art Workshop's Illustration Intensive. It's a five-day workshop taking place June 18-22, 2018 at Alverno College in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
We are thrilled to have two incredible Guests of Honor so far, award-winning illustrator Scott Gustafson and publisher/art director Jon Schindehette. Faculty includes myself, and fellow artists Aaron Miller, and Steve Prescott.

updates.update_userinfo: Our Card Tokens featuring Groblins Kickstarter is LIVE!
updates.update_content:
Hi, Everyone.
I'm happy to announce we just launched another Kickstarter project. I know you're a fan of our art tutorial videos since you graciously backed this Oil DVD project and may have even backed our previous Acrylic DVD project, but our new project is not an art tutorial video. The new project is called "Card Tokens featuring Groblins" and is for the creation of a pack of card tokens that card game players use in games such as Magic: the Gathering. The art showcases the more humorous side of my art and personality. If you play MTG or have friends that play, they might be interested in this Kickstarter campaign. Please give it a look to see what it's all about.

updates.update_userinfo: Upcoming in-person workshop & ImagineFX 5 Star review!!
updates.update_content:
Hello, everyone.
Two quick announcements.
Fantasy Illustration In-Person Workshop
Fantasy Art Workshop (that's me and Silvia) is going to have an in-person workshop June 18-22, 2018. It will be a 5-day illustration workshop, meaning any mediums are allowed, even digital illustration. The workshop will take place in Milwaukee, Wisconsin on the beautiful Alverno College campus. We do not have all the details worked out yet, including price. But the price will include the workshop fee, room and board, and meals on the campus. The campus is just 15 minutes from the airport as well :-)

updates.update_userinfo: Lots of news!!
updates.update_content:
Hello all,
Silvia and I are on our way right now to Spectrum Live in Kansas City, Missouri for a wonderful art convention. But I'm happy to report that we were able to ship out DVDs and other rewards yesterday to most backers before we left :-)
That's it for now. I'm looking forward to a few days of hanging out with fellow artists at Spectrum Live.

campaign.story:
Français • Italiano • Español • Português • Nederlands • Svenska • Deutsch • Pyсский • Malay • 한국어 • 中文 / 如何訂購 • 日本語 • العربية 
               Your phone gives you complete control over the Podo.
The micro-adhesive pad lets Podo stick on basically anything.
Podo shoots photos, videos, and time lapse. Set any interval and Podo will capture everything automatically. See one here.
This advanced software and go-anywhere size make Podo the most versatile, and easy-to-use camera ever!
How to order on Kickstarter: Click "Back This Project" and select a reward, add $5 per item for accessories (see below), then complete your pledge. For more details see bottom of this page.
Podo makes a perfect holiday or birthday gift, and pledging today lets you save up to 50% off future prices!
STRETCH GOALS
UNLOCKED - Upgraded tin packaging
UNLOCKED - Image processing upgrade
UNLOCKED - Free upgrade for carrying cases
UNLOCKED - Water proof case add-on
UNLOCKED - Backers up to $600k Xmas Shipping 
UNLOCKED - Stereoscopic shooting mode
$800k - Free upgrade for water proof cases
$900k - Free hard shell gear case
$1M - Double the memory free upgrade, new colors, filters!
Learn more here.
REWARDS
Benefits
Freedom: Capture any moment from any perspective. Your shots are no longer limited by the reach of your arm.
No mounts, stands, or selfie sticks required.
Control: The Podo app puts you in control for every shot. Wirelessly preview, capture, and transfer, with Bluetooth technology.
Every shot is perfect because you're the one who took it.
USE CASES
Your phone is great, but it's not always the right camera for the job.
Our customers love how easy it is to use Podo to enhance their lifestyles:
Everyday adventures:
Self-portraits: Ditch your selfie stick for good.
Group photos: Fit everyone in on the very first try.
Family: Fun for even the most camera-shy little-ones.
Animals: Get up-close on their level with your pets.
Food: Snap a recipe step-by-step or get that perfect food pic.
Cars: Use Podo as an easy backup cam.
For your passions:
Photography: A fun and creative addition to your gear bag.
Travel: Never miss a photo op, without relying on strangers.
Style & Fashion: Check your outfit from the back, and take your #ootd.
Fitness: Check your form, yoga poses, and of course, progress pics!
Sports: Record your swing, or watch a basket from the back board.
Artists: Dancers, musicians, stop-motion animators, painters, etc.
Time Lapse: Set any interval for the easiest time lapse ever.
Perfect for events:
Weddings/Parties: Capture it all automatically with time lapse.
Concerts: Get every angle of the venue without running any cables.
Multi-angle: Use multiple Podos to capture everything at once.
Photo booth: Everyone loves a good photo booth!
FEATURES
Large Pixel Size
The pixels on our sensor (2.2 μm) are 50% bigger than those in the iPhone 7 (1.5 μm) and the Galaxy S7 (1.4 μm).
Bigger pixels collect more light, leading to increased dynamic range, improved low-light performance, and reduced noise. Bigger pixels = better picture.
Choosing a 5MP camera allows bigger pixels within the same sensor size, and is enough megapixels to print at 14"x11" full resolution.
See sample images here.
Micro-Adhesive Sticky Pad
Podo sticks with a quick press, then peels right off. It physically "grips" the wall so it doesn't wear out, and you can clean it with water. Think gecko's feet...but on a camera.
No other stands, clips, or mounts required. Just slip Podo in your pocket and you're good to go.
Sound like magic? It feels like it too! Just wait until you try it yourself.
For a short video on how it works, click here.
The Podo App
Our camera may be tiny, but it becomes powerful by partnering with your phone. Bluetooth technology lets your phone act as a complete wireless controller.

1. Wake Podo up and start the preview, all from within the app
2. Adjust settings, hit the shutter, or start a countdown
3. Choose your favorite shots and transfer them to your phone
When you're done, just stick Podo in your pocket and it will return to sleep automatically. 
The Podo App is free for iOS and Android. Requires iPhone 5/Android 4.4 or higher.
Photo transfer times vary with phone model and strength of Bluetooth connection. Typical transfer time for a 5MP photo is 2-4 seconds.
App Modes
PHOTO: Simple. Fun. Our bread and butter.
LAPSE: Set any interval for the easiest time lapse ever. (Does not require connection with phone)
VIDEO: 720p HD video at 30 fps. Your phone records the audio like a wireless mic.
MULTI (new): Capture photo, video, or lapse with up to 6 Podos simultaneously in a unique and immersive way.
BOOTH (new): Easily provide the classic photo booth experience. Silly faces are highly recommended!
SOLO (new): Activate tap-gesture controls and put your phone away. 
As we update the app, Podo will gain even more features over time!
More Features
Fully rotating hinge lets you shoot any angle 
Accelerometer automatically orients the photos LEDs indicate Podo's actions (not for flash) 
Adjustable countdown timer 8GB memory holds thousands of photos 
Li-ion battery lasts 1,000 photos or 2 weeks in standby
TECH SPECS
Size: 1.3" x 1.3" x 1.5" (3 x 3 x 4.5 cm)
Weight: 1.5 oz (43 g)
Sensor: 5 MP (2.2 μm pixels)
Video: 720p 30fps
Lens: 90° wide-angle, glass
Memory: 8 GB
8-LED ring
Bluetooth 4.2 LE + Classic
Accelerometer
Rechargeable battery (up to 1.5 hrs. video)
ACCESSORIES
To order an accessory, add its price to your final pledge amount. Do not change reward level. You can add accessories in any quantity and combination. Watch here.

You will specify your specific accessory choices via online form after the campaign is over. See bottom of page for detailed instruction.

The Choices:
Sticky pads are 12x6 cm and perfect for sticking your phone to your dashboard, hanging keys and cards by the door, or for mounting frames and posters. *These are stand-alone bonus pieces, not replacements for the Podo.*
Drawstring bag is perfect as a gym back or light daily carry!
Carrying case is made of high-quality Santoprene (industrial-grade, highly durable) and allows Podo to hang on your bag, belt, etc. Thanks to the success of this campaign, we're also including a neoprene sleeve with magnet enclosure that fully protects your Podo.
BACKER REFERRAL PROGRAM
Refer your friends and earn free stuff! Simple.
We count the number of Podos referred. So if your friend orders 6 Podos, you get credit for 6 referrals. What a good friend.
The top referrer overall also receives:
Two advance Podos from our manufacturing test runs
The very first Podo from mass production! (#001)
See the bottom of this page for the full how-to and program rules. Good luck!

RETURNING BACKERS
If you pledge for a Podo yet again, we'll send you one free gift bundle of:
3 piece Sticky pad set ($10 value) 
Podo carrying case ($10 value) 
Drawstring bag ($10 value) 
Our sincere gratitude, again.
ABOUT US
The founders, Eddie, Jae, and Sam, began as friends and roommates at UC Berkeley. We got tired of someone always getting left out of group photos and needing cables to transfer photos from Jae's DSLR. We wanted something much more versatile and easy to use, so we made it!
We raised $427,000 last year from over 3,600 amazing backers. Podo shipped worldwide, won global design awards, and starred on TV, magazines, and even a music video.
Podo represents our passion, our team’s grit, and our conviction that technology should be fun and simple. Thank you to every fan and supporter who’s shown us love along the way.
HOW TO ORDER
1. Back this Project: Click "Back This Project" at the top of this page, or click here. You may choose a maximum of one reward level.

2. Add accessories: Add $5 extra to your total pledge amount per accessory you would like to order. There is no limit to how many or which combination you can order, and there is no additional shipping cost required. See above for accessory choices.

3. Finish payment, and that's it: Your credit card will not be charged until the campaign is completely over. Once it is charged, we will ask you for your shipping address and which accessories you chose, if any.

Note: We do not handle VAT or other import duties for shipments, and we do not charge for this upfront. We are not professional agents in this regard and cannot give you estimates or tax advice. Backers may face additional customs costs upon delivery of their Podo. To avoid regulatory problems, we will put the reward level value (sans shipping) on the declaration. We cannot promise to do otherwise. Thank you!

HOW TO ADD ACCESSORIES
Click "Manage My Pledge", then "Change your pledge". Do not change your choice of reward.

As seen in the video below, you must manually add to your total pledge amount to reserve your accessories.

We will confirm your choice of accessories via survey once the campaign is over.
PLAY

REFERRAL PROGRAM RULES

Procedure
Find your backer number. To find it, visit https://www.kickstarter.com/profile/backings and find us under "Active pledges." Scroll down.
Affix your backer number to the beginning of podolabs.com followed by a period (no commas). 
For example, backer number 9,999 would use 9999.podolabs.com
Share your unique link with friends and family. 
If they use it to order, you will automatically get credit!
Rules:
You must pledge for your own Podo(s) first.
Referral credits are calculated after the campaign is over.
We cannot respond to individual requests for referral count status. 
Cancelled orders or failed payments do not count. 
Your referral must use your link to pledge in one session or the referral will not register. 
Please do not try to game the system (we'll know) or you will forfeit any and all rewards. 
The Really Big Pack counts as ten referrals. 
If someone has already pledged once, they cannot re-pledge using your link.
3 days before the campaign concludes, we will post referral totals for all backers so you can get an idea. However, the official count will only come after the campaign concludes, as some referrals may cancel their pledge.
Thank you and good luck!
EXTRAS
Visit www.youtube.com/c/podolabs for fun and informational Podo videos!

Take your camera and stick it:
   Cher Lloyd - Activated Music Video
    How Podo Works:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is no longer our first rodeo, and there are many reasons why we expect to deliver faster than last time. For one, this version is much improved but similar enough that we can reuse much of what we learned.
Second, we're further along in the manufacturing process; we've already down-paid for the early bird units and tooling has already begun. Third, our new manufacturer is much more experienced with high volumes of cameras. Lastly, we know not to run into the same certification delays as last time. 

And of course, we are still under Highway1/PCH's experienced wing, who's motto is appropriately, "We Make".
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
David & Roz explain how FaceCradle was invented.
PLAY

Click the Links below to see what others are saying about FaceCradle!
RightThisMinute: http://www.rightthisminute.com/video/rtmtv-facecradle-will-have-you-sleeping-baby-your-next-trip
Huffington Post: http://www.huffingtonpost.com/jack-choros/crowdfunded-travel-pillow_b_11678202.html?
i4U: http://www.i4u.com/2016/08/114423/facecradle-travel-pillow-makes-sleeping-economy-class-reality
Benzinga: http://www.benzinga.com/pressreleases/16/08/p8363312/australian-team-launches-innovative-five-position-facecradle-travel-pil
PLAY

 The strap attaches to a winged headrest on most long haul flights.
PLAY

There is no need to recline your seat with FaceCradle!  So if there is no winged headrest, a pleasant chat to the person behind will ensure the strap doesn't obstruct their screen.
PLAY

 See how to unlock the pillows (both sides  are squeezed simultaneously)
 Eye mask on, headphones in, hoodie over,  lights out, doze off to longer periods of  sleep!
 Carries so conveniently.
 Removable, machine washable, brushed    velour fabric covers, over hypoallergenic  memory foam.
 FaceCradle Travelers arrive happy and  start their adventure rested and ready to go!   
Get Your Project Funded Today!
  Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
FaceCradle Production is ready in September 2016 for delivery for Kickstarter backers in October 2016.  We will deliver to the  high quality standards you would expect! (Note: Kickstarter will not bill you until the Campaign end on Oct 1 so we would ship after that). Countless hours of design and development, prototypes, samples and testing of all the components and the complete product are all behind us.  So FaceCradle is much more than a great idea!
We are opening the oven door and smelling the great aroma of what we have made!  Our friends and family are now enjoying the sleep they have longed for each time they travel and now, so can you!
We have realized that people all over the world desperately want to sleep on planes, trains, buses and in the back seat of cars.  Some also want to take a power nap in the gate lounge or at work, or while studying.  So we want to take FaceCradle to the world as fast as we can!
Our factories require up to 50% deposit up front for our orders, we have to pay for distribution, warehousing costs etc, a huge investment.  We also have to present the product to distribution partners and retailers to open up the channels. This involves making connections, attending trade shows, sending out samples, making quotations and in some cases visiting potential customers in their global offices. We have to produce a lot more marketing information like point of sale merchandising, brochures and materials that help explain to the masses, the benefits of buying a FaceCradle.
Our initial teaser video post on our Facebook page showed incredible support for FaceCadle in many countries.  You can read the comments about the video on www.facebook.com/facecradle.  What was really amazing is we spent less than $100 to boost it and received around 500,000 views!  So with your help, we hope it won't be long before we achieve our Kickstarter goal.
The big Retailers today, rarely buy a product if they can't see the demand immediately, so we want to reach as many people world-wide as we can, to let them know about this great product.  Your support will ensure that hundreds of thousands of people get to learn about the benefits of FaceCradle, so they will then immediately start asking about the product in those Retail stores.  It is so crucial that products sell from day one, when a Retailer stocks it, otherwise they could mark it down just weeks after receiving it, killing the product instantly.
Of course any great idea is bound to be copied, right?  We have already invested a lot to establish our patent protection which we understand to be very strong and these costs will start to escalate.  
FaceCradle is too good not to launch it professionally, so please lock arms with us in unity, to make the initial production quantities, put the distribution and marketing in place and to make this work together!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Given the product design, development and testing is complete, we have reduced many risks already regarding product quality and reliability. 

Our next challenge is to ensure our new born leaves the nest and survives it's predators in the global market place and that our intellectual property (Patent, Trademark etc) ensures FaceCradle's design isn't copied. 

FaceCradle's inventor has designed, developed and marketed over 30 products globally so the path of pitfalls has been traveled before. 

Resistance is expected to be met in the market place from existing travel goods companies who have representatives by the thousands, ready to put FaceCradle down to protect their products. So we must reach the Retailers and Consumers to gain their confidence beforehand. 

We have experienced some people commenting that the Deep Sleep Mode looks odd and they would be embarrassed to use the product. 

Logic says that when the lights are out on a long haul flight for example, who cares what you look like! No sleep makes you look much worse! We think those comments come from people who haven't traveled because those that have, would think sleep is far more important.

FaceCradle has 5 comfort modes, one of them is the same as a regular neck pillow, so the worst result is you get one of those! Deep Sleep Mode just happens to be one of the most comfortable! 

We therefore have to re-assure people and give them confidence to buy FaceCradle. As we all know, the consumer masses are followers, who gain comfort from those who are brave enough to adopt great new products early.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Zubits magnetic lacing solution is back with new colors and new lace holders for even easier micro-adjustments and installation. (patents pending)
Zubits® make your shoes insanely easy. Just imagine...
Slip into wide open shoes as if there were no laces at all. 
Never tie laces again. Close with a simple magnetic click.
Remove your shoes hands-free.
No more tying, knots, double knots, or laces coming undone.
No more ugly floppy bows. Just a clean looking shoe.
Magnetically pair up your shoes and organize them in new places.
  Zubits high-tech magnets are incredibly strong. Really, you won't believe it. They can hold up to 16lbs of force and stay secure for running, parkour, going to the gym, or playing recreational sports. Thanks to Bay Area Movement (parkour)!
Don't be fooled by fake / copycat magnetic shoe closures that are too weak to work.
Yes, others have already tried to copy our great idea but fake magnetic shoe closures are of the poorest quality and don't work. Fakes look similar on the outside, but split them apart and you will see exposed weak disc magnets that aren't strong enough for a child to use! The exposed magnets will also fall out, will scratch and chip, will corrode when wet, and don't include lace securing clips. They simply don't work! Zubits "magnetic array" technology makes our magnets more than twice as strong... which is the only way magnetic shoe closures can work.
  Zubits® give your shoes a clean look with no messy bows.
                  Easily pair up shoes and organize them in new places. It's fun for kids to put their shoes away and easy for them to find their pair of shoes later.
  Buy two pairs and mix colors to support your favorite sports team.
  Use Zubits closures on all types of shoes for all sorts of purposes.
  NEW COLORS - Match your shoes or make your Zubits closures stand out. After the campaign ends you will be sent a survey asking what size and color you want. ALL 12 COLORS WILL BE AVAILABLE FOR THIS CAMPAIGN.
  Newly designed clips help you secure your laces quickly and easily, allowing you to make micro fit adjustments (looser or tighter) at any time and makes installation easier than before.
Don't be fooled by fake / copycat magnetic shoe closures that are too weak to work.
Yes, others have already tried to copy our great idea but fake Zubits are of the poorest quality and don't work. Fakes look similar on the outside, but split them apart and you see exposed weak disc magnets that aren't strong enough for a child to use!  The exposed magnets will also fall out, will scratch and chip, will corrode when wet, and don't include lace securing clips.  They simply don't work.  Zubits "magnetic array" technology means our magnets are more than twice as strong... which is the only way magnetic shoe closures can work.
Get Your Project Funded Today!
    After the campaign ends, you will be sent a survey asking you to choose your preferred size and color for each pair of Zubits closures you purchased. The survey will explain the size choices thoroughly to help you decide.
  PLAY

   Estimated Production Timeline
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already produced the basic Zubits magnets and adding colors should not be overly complicated. The new securing clips we are designing and manufacturing for the first time should also be manageable. We have the CAD designs finished and 3D printed samples. We will need to develop steel molds for mass production. This should only take a few weeks to accomplish, then we would want to test the quality of injection molded pieces. We may need to make a few changes or change plastic material, but again, the securing clips are not a very challenging part of the project.

Our first campaign was successful and we delivered our Zubits closures to more than 7,300 backers. The manufacturing took a couple extra months to complete, but a quality product was delivered and almost all Zubits backers were very satisfied.

We do not perceive significant challenges to delivering this product, but even if we do have major challenges, our existing Zubits closure inventory and formerly used clips could be used to satisfy backers. So even in a worst case scenario backers would not be left empty handed. Nevertheless, we are confident we can deliver new Zubits with new clips.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
THUNDER MONKEY The Young Years #1 a new ALL AGES comic.
THUNDER MONKEY, a superhero monkey with exploding skin! Think Curious George with superpowers. If you enjoy Pixar movies like the Incredibles then you will like THUNDER MONKEY. The downside of having exploding skin is constantly having everything blowing up in your face! THUNDER MONKEY lives in Summercity with his adopted family. Doc Phazer - the worrisome and distracted scientist who discovered THUNDER MONKEY, Addison - his trouble seeking daughter and Widget, the robot make up the family cast. The story hops right into an adventure featuring a young THUNDER MONKEY. Events are set into motion that will haunt THUNDER MONKEY'S future. One of THUNDER MONKEY'S unfavorable abilities is to create powerful enemies. Who is the mysterious super villain lurking in the shadows?
Cover THUNDER MONKEY THE YOUNG YEARS #1
   Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 page 1

  Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 Page 2
     THUNDER MONKEY Facebook page
Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 Page 3
   Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 Page 4
   Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 Page 5
THUNDER MONKEY has been my baby since high-school. He appeared as a bootleg comic that I printed myself, came along as a college newspaper strip at the Savannah College of Art and Design and has appeared in published comics.  
WHY KICKSTARTER?
Publishing comics involves many hurdles. Unless tens of thousands of people order your unknown book from the get go, it will not survive. Kickstarter, however, only requires hundreds of backers instead of tens of thousands. In essence and here's the beauty of it that I love, you - the backer - become the publisher! The people decide themselves to help make a project come to life. You, like the big publishers give me the green light by pre-ordering. And just like a publisher your job is also to help spread the word. I only have one voice, but together the sky is the limit.
SHARE
My goal is for every backer to share the link to this Kickstarter on their Facebook and or Twitter. If you can do more, then you my friend are awesome! Don't hesitate to reach out to me, I'd be happy to have you on my team. That's what it's really about, building a community of people who want to see THUNDER MONKEY. Go to the THUNDER MONKEY Facebook page and share.
GOAL
Why is the goal so low? I am the writer and the artist, so production costs aren't as high. I'm not going to lose money because the rewards are built to cover the costs associated with each reward. I have quotes from $2.17 per book to $3.00 per book based on how many I print. Postage to ship one book costs around $2.60. And then there are envelopes, bags, etc... $5 per book barely covers those costs, that's why I rely on the other items to fund the project. Posters cost the least to produce, so if you're not sure what to order, know that posters will help a lot. I'm looking at 2 to 3 months of work when all is said and done. Above $2,000 and I will start to get "paid" for the work with about 10% going to the Kickstarter fees.
Thunder Monkey Poster and Variant Cover
STRETCH GOALS 
If the $4,000 Stretch goal is reached I will reveal the uber secret THUNDER MONKEY HANDSHAKE. This grants entrance to an exclusive elite secret society of fandom. I will also send out a How to Draw THUNDER MONKEY PDF.
If the $6,000 Stretch goal is hit I will add an additional comic to all the US rewards at or above the "Banana Split" level. International backers will get one also, if it does not increase their shipping amount otherwise they will receive a collector's card.
If $9,000 is hit, an additional BRAND NEW second issue of THUNDER MONKEY will be funded and ALL backers will receive the entire second issue in digital form.
Timeline
The script is written, the layouts are done and five of the 24 pages are colored and lettered. The colored sketches are also already in production. I have gathered quotes from printers and prices for shipping materials. Everything is ready to go. I expect to have the book printed by the end of July, but I gave myself a two month cushion.
Sample of Production Art - Layouts
This is a Kickstarter exclusive. As of now there are no plans to distribute the book by other means. I'm not going to order hundreds of extra copies.  
I really wanted to have a local aspect so I have partnered with the following stores located in my area, and will be printing the books locally. If you let me know in the notes WHERE you will be picking up your rewards I will personalize your copy of the book! Let me know the name you want on the book.
GRYPHON GAMES AND COMICS Fort Collins Colorado
GRYPHON GAMES AND COMICS Cheyenne Wyoming
TIME WARP Boulder Colorado
I WANT MORE COMICS Denver Colorado
MILE HIGH COMICS JASON STREET Denver Colorado
If you feel compelled to back my project, congratulations! You are now my publisher! DON'T FORGET to spread the word. If you have any questions I will do my best to follow up.
Thank you,
LEE OAKS!
Colored Pencil Sketch
   Be sure to indicate MENS, WOMENS OR YOUTH and which size.
   Womens T-Shirt
   Enhances your muscles to make you look even better. Men's Thunder Monkey T-Shirt
      Water Color Commssions
       NEW Ala Carte Add-Ons
These Add-Ons are a way for you to get the items you want. Simply add the amount for any extras you may want onto your normal pledge amount.
Simply select "manage my pledge" and change the dollar amount.
Once the Kickstarter is over, you'll receive a backer survey from me confirming both your total pledge amount and the number and type of extras you wanted. Please contact me with any questions!
See more of Lee'sPoster options by clicking on image
 HOW TO PLEDGE
Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories.
A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge."
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge.
Pledge levels vary from just $2 to several hundred dollars. And each different level opens up a new creative reward. (For a full list, check out the right side of this page).
You can become a backer in just three easy steps:
Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we're offering in the right sidebar of this page. Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page. Step 3: Enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing!
Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter, and to tell your friends.
Le SINGE DU TONNERRE Les Jeunes Années #1 est une nouvelle bande dessinée de 24 pages adaptée à tous les âges.
Le SINGE DU TONNERRE est un superhéros à la peau explosive ! Imaginez “George le petit curieux” en tant que superhéros. Si vous aimez les singes, vous aimerez le SINGE DU TONNERRE.
L’histoire débute en pleine aventure avec le jeune SINGE DU TONNERRE comme personnage principal. Les évènements qui s’enchainent viendront hanter le future du SINGE DU TONNERRE. Un des malheureux talents du SINGE DU TONNERRE est de se créer des ennemis puissants. Entre nous – il est très doué pour ça.
Le SINGE DU TONNERRE est mon personnage depuis le lycée. Il est d’abord apparu dans une bande dessinée que j’ai imprimée et agrafée moi-même. Il a ensuite fait partie d’une BD dans le journal de l’université au Savannah College of Art and Design and a enfin été publié dans des comics.
Mon nom est Lee Oaks. Je dessine des BD, c’est mon job. Voici quelques livres sur lesquels j’ai travaillé.
Publier des bandes dessinées comprend pas mal d’obstacles. A moins que des milliers de gens commandent votre livre inconnu dès le départ, il ne survivra pas. Kickstarter, cependant, ne requiert que des centaines de supporters, et non des milliers. En bref, et c’est ce que je préfère dans le projet, ce sont vous, les supporters, qui publiez le livre !
Et en tant qu’éditeur, votre boulot est de faire passer le mot. Je ne suis pas un génie du marketing et je ne suis qu’une seule personne. J’ai besoin de votre aide. Sans vous, ma seule promotion est mon statut sur Facebook, “Salut ! Je viens de lancer un Kickstarter !”
Mon projet est de dessiner les personnages dont j’ai toujours rêvé. Le fait de les rendre disponibles pour ceux qui veulent les voir est mon idéal.
Pourquoi le montant de mon objectif est-il si bas ? Contrairement aux campagnes qui incluent un des auteurs et artistes qui doivent être payés pour créer les livres, je fais tout moi-même.
Le scenario est écrit, les croquis sont terminés, et les 5 premières pages coloriées et lettrées. Tout est prêt.
Si vous souhaitez être supporter de mon projet, félicitations ! Vous êtes maintenant mon éditeur. N’oubliez pas de faire passer le mot ! Si vous avez des questions, je ferai de mon mieux pour répondre.
Merci d’avance,
LEE OAKS!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The biggest challenge I foresee is printing shipping labels and packaging the shipments. I have an eBay store and I know it takes 15 minutes per package to prep. On the production side, I have illustrated 7+ graphic novels and various comics professionally over several years and have never missed a deadline. I illustrated ESCAPE FROM TERRA the daily web comic for 4 years. No deadline can stop me. In the event of an unforeseeable natural disaster, you will be updated in a responsible manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Thunder Monkey strikes again!
updates.update_content:
Thunder Monkey is back, but this time he has brought some friends.  I have teamed up with 30+ independent creators that I know to make a Comic book Crossover.  It is written by long time friend and collaborator (not to mention Eisner winning) Mike Baron!
Creators were brought together for their unique characters and their talent whether they have worked for big companies or not.
Your support and help spreading the word would be greatly appreciated.

updates.update_userinfo: Thunder Monkey Release Party
updates.update_content:
Thunder Monkey Release Party     Saturday Nov. 19th 6 - 9 PM.
The Thunder Monkey Kickstarter concludes with a little release party for the book, scheduled from 6 - 9 PM at Gryphon's Games & Comics store in Fort Collins, Colorado. They have an open cafe for drinks and some food items. You can pick up your rewards. I may have some extra copies of the book and other reward items available for purchase if you missed out on something. I might also have some new exclusives and news for what's to come. Mingle with other comics creators and enthusiasts from the area.  You are welcome to invite friends.
I'm super happy with how the book turned out.  The printer, Bob Conway, did a fantastic job.  If you need something printed I highly recommend him.  His info can be found inside the book.

updates.update_userinfo: Thunder Monkey The Young Years #1 is complete and the PDF is up!
updates.update_content:
There is one week left in the THUNDER MONKEY KickStarter! I can't thank you enough for supporting me. Since this is the final stretch to the finish I'm adding some ADD-ON rewards to the campaign.
I am offering the T-shirt, and a 3" Die cut Magnet as add-ons. I have the magnets in hand and they look great. Simply select "manage my pledge" and change the dollar amount to add any extras.

updates.update_userinfo: WE DID IT!
updates.update_content:
We did it!  (We as in you and me.)  This is very good news for the future of THUNDER MONKEY!  But it doesn't mean our work is done.  Keep spreading the word.  Our next goal is to get THUNDER MONKEY out of the "invisible" section of the KickStarter list and into the highlighted section.  It makes a big difference of what will come next.  Reach out to friends and see if they can pledge $1 to get those backer numbers up.  If we hit the stretch goal it will be good news for everybody.
I am holding a contest outside of KickStarter to reward those who spread the word.  Prizes include a cover style drawing of your choice and runner up prizes are a never released print inked by the one and only Kevin Nowlan.  At the end of the campaign I will tally up the referrals and dish out the prizes.  Check the THUNDER MONKEY Facebook page for more:  https://www.facebook.com/theofficialthundermonkey/
